title: PhishGuard
description: PhishGuard is a machine learning‚Äìbased phishing detection system that identifies malicious emails, messages, and URLs by analyzing suspicious language, deceptive links, and social engineering patterns.

caseHero.subtitle: AI-Based Phishing Detection System
caseHero.impact: üö® Detects malicious URLs & emails using machine learning

overview.title: Project Overview
overview.text: PhishGuard is an AI-powered cybersecurity tool designed to detect phishing URLs and malicious emails in real time. The system leverages machine learning models trained on real-world datasets to classify threats with high accuracy. Built with a FastAPI backend and a modern web interface, PhishGuard provides instant risk analysis for users and organizations seeking proactive digital security.

problem.title: Problem Statement
problem.text: Phishing attacks remain one of the most common cybersecurity threats, causing data breaches, financial loss, and identity theft. Existing tools are often complex, slow, or inaccessible to non-technical users. There was a need for a lightweight, real-time solution that could accurately classify phishing attempts and present results in a user-friendly interface.

approach.title: Solution & Approach
points: Designed a machine learning pipeline for URL and email text classification
Trained models using Scikit-Learn on phishing datasets
Built a FastAPI backend for real-time prediction APIs
Developed a responsive frontend for instant threat feedback
Implemented MongoDB for logging and analytics

architecture.title: System Architecture
architecture.text: The system follows a modular architecture where the frontend communicates with a FastAPI backend that hosts the trained ML model. User inputs are processed, classified, and stored in MongoDB for analytics and reporting.

features.title: Real-time Detection
features.desc: Instant analysis of URLs and emails

impact: üöÄ Achieved high detection accuracy on test datasets
üîç Processed phishing URLs in under 1 second
üèÜ Featured as a flagship project in my portfolio

challenges.title: Challenges & Learnings
challenges.text: One of the main challenges was handling imbalanced phishing datasets, which required careful preprocessing and model tuning. I also learned how to deploy ML models behind REST APIs using FastAPI and optimize inference performance for real-time classification.
